column4: Is there a command to kill every running process without shutting the pc down?
Better yet: Is there a good document thats pretty all-inclusive on learning Linux?
the man pages help me learn how to use a command
It doesn't tell me all of the commands
OK so theres a start: the commands
How about if I wanted to design my own program?
Baby steps are a good idea
But even a baby needs a hand to hold
So where can I find this proverbial hand to hold?
Also travisHAZE, you can press tab twice.
